entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
